title: Gluttony

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose to make a Deal with a non-Peasant player. At night, open a chat with that player anonymously.
- At night, you may consume 3 stacks of Devour to eat a player, killing them and cleaning them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- For each player who holds a gift, you gain one stack of Devour at the start of the night.
- At the start of the night, if you have no players who hold gifts, you gain a stack of Devour.
- When a player is in a Deal, they gain the option to gain one of three gifts. If they choose to take a gift, you immediately gain a stack of Devour:
1] Immortality: The next time you would die, either at night or being hanged, the entire town is instead informed you cheated death and you live.
2] Dark Power: You gain the ability to deal a basic astral attack at night instead of your normal ability.
3] Knowledge: You learn any player's role. If evil or neutral, you instead can read whispers.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4332
*The greasy fry-cook released a deep guttural laugh, the scent of cooking oil and blood wafting from him. "Savor the taste. I'll come back to take what's mine in no time."*
